Title: Roadtrip
Plot: Hoping to get over Jen, Dawson agrees to join Pacey and Billy in a boys night out and finds what he is looking for in another woman. Meanwhile Jen handles damage control after Joey becomes the subject of a rumor at school.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Violence, coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Monica Keena, Eric Balfour, Eion Bailey, Helen Baldwin, Melissa Suzanne McBride, Jessica Chappell, J.R. Rodriguez
